Dr. Lee on The Doctors TV

Watch as Dr. Lee helps a family improve their communication and resolve anger.

By Dr. Samuel Lee

Dr. Tyler is a preventative medicine specialist based in Santa Monica, CA. In his practice, Dr. Tyler explores data-driven treatment approaches to increase healthspan, and well-being, and optimize cognitive and physical health.
